patthana13.5:1.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:1.1_1: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:1.1_2: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:1.1_3: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:1.1_4: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:2.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:2.1_1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:2.1_2: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:3.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:3.1_1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:3.1_2: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:3.1_3: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:3.1_4: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.5:4.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.5:5.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… tīṇi.
